title: Poco F7 stops by the FCC on the way to its global launch
description: The Poco F7 Pro and F7 Ultra are already out, and they're currently waiting on the third sibling to join them in the brand's roster. The Poco F7 is definitely coming soon, and it will be launched in India as evidenced by a recent certification over there. [#InlinePriceWidget,13724,1#] [#InlinePriceWidget,13723,1#] Today we get confirmation that it's also going to be launched in other global markets, as it's been spotted at the FCC. The certification process has revealed the shot you can see below, which shows the device's front, even if it's definitely not the best image - but still...
excerpt: Its release seems pretty much imminent now. The Poco F7 Pro and F7 Ultra are already out, and they're currently waiting on the third sibling to join them...
text: The Poco F7 Pro and F7 Ultra are already out, and they're currently waiting on the third sibling to join them in the brand's roster. The Poco F7 is definitely coming soon, and it will be launched in India as evidenced by a recent certification over there. Xiaomi Poco F7 Pro These are the best offers from our affiliate partners. We may get a commission from qualifying sales. 512GB 12GB RAM$ 679.00£ 502.27256GB 12GB RAM£ 482.52€ 499.00Show all prices Xiaomi Poco F7 Ultra These are the best offers from our affiliate partners. We may get a commission from qualifying sales. 256GB 12GB RAM€ 699.90512GB 16GB RAM€ 749.90Show all prices Today we get confirmation that it's also going to be launched in other global markets, as it's been spotted at the FCC. The certification process has revealed the shot you can see below, which shows the device's front, even if it's definitely not the best image - but still better than nothing. The phone is rumored to be a rebranded Redmi Turbo 4 Pro, which launched in China last month. If this is true, then the Poco F7 will have a 6.83-inch 1280x2772 AMOLED screen with 120 Hz refresh rate and 3,200-nit peak brightness, the Snapdragon 8s Gen 4 SoC at the helm, 12/16GB of RAM, 256GB/512GB/1TB of storage, a 50 MP main camera with OIS, an 8 MP ultrawide, a 20 MP selfie snapper, and a 7,550 mAh battery with support for 90W wired charging and 22.5W reverse wired charging. It should run Android 15 with Xiaomi's HyperOS on top. According to a past rumor, the Poco F7 will be officially unveiled in late May. Via
html:
The Poco F7 Pro and F7 Ultra are already out, and they're currently waiting on the third sibling to join them in the brand's roster. The Poco F7 is definitely coming soon, and it will be launched in India as evidenced by a recent certification over there.

Xiaomi Poco F7 Pro

These are the best offers from our affiliate partners. We may get a commission from qualifying sales.
512GB 12GB RAM$ 679.00£ 502.27
256GB 12GB RAM£ 482.52€ 499.00
Show all prices

Xiaomi Poco F7 Ultra

These are the best offers from our affiliate partners. We may get a commission from qualifying sales.
256GB 12GB RAM€ 699.90
512GB 16GB RAM€ 749.90
Show all prices

Today we get confirmation that it's also going to be launched in other global markets, as it's been spotted at the FCC. The certification process has revealed the shot you can see below, which shows the device's front, even if it's definitely not the best image - but still better than nothing.

The phone is rumored to be a rebranded Redmi Turbo 4 Pro, which launched in China last month. If this is true, then the Poco F7 will have a 6.83-inch 1280x2772 AMOLED screen with 120 Hz refresh rate and 3,200-nit peak brightness, the Snapdragon 8s Gen 4 SoC at the helm, 12/16GB of RAM, 256GB/512GB/1TB of storage, a 50 MP main camera with OIS, an 8 MP ultrawide, a 20 MP selfie snapper, and a 7,550 mAh battery with support for 90W wired charging and 22.5W reverse wired charging. It should run Android 15 with Xiaomi's HyperOS on top.

According to a past rumor, the Poco F7 will be officially unveiled in late May.

Via
